dct_description_sm: Shapefile representing historical boundaries of regions and provinces in Nigeria for 1948. GADM country-level administrative shapefiles were conflated with, and where necessary supplemented by, the extracted boundaries of a scanned British Colonial Office map.
dct_creator_sm: Map and Geospatial Information Center, Lewis Library, Princeton University
